channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Queen Bey and Yale: The Ivy League university is set to offer a course on Beyoncé and her legacy
item.description: Pop superstar Beyoncé and her expansive cultural legacy will be the subject of a new course next year at Yale University.

item.title: Voters in California city reject measure allowing noncitizens to vote in local races
item.description: Voters in a Southern California city have rejected a measure that would have allowed residents who aren’t U.S. citizens to vote in local elections.

item.title: Saks Fifth Avenue’s holiday light display in Manhattan changing up this season
item.description: Dazzling displays of synchronized lights on the facade of Saks Fifth Avenue’s flagship store in midtown Manhattan have thrilled holiday visitors for years.
